_header: Hail Thee fairest there ever God found
Note: For a very similar piece see 1705.
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: John Audelay, ‘Oracio de sancta Maria virgine’ — ten 12-line stanzas, with ‘Haile’ anaphora

BodDou302.First Lines:
Haile þe fayrst þer euer God fondHaile maid & moder
                    haile mayd fre…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…With þese sayntis to haue aseteHer haile blest froyte
                    haile swete floure
BodDou302.Attributed Title: Alia oracio de sancta Maria virgine (f. 23v)
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.

         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 155-9.
